question:
Consider the following statements about Indus Valley Civilization:
  1. Terracotta female figures have been found from Lothal and Kalibangan
  2. Red-sandstone torso of a nude male figure was found at Harappa
  3. Both Kalibangan and Lothal were coastal/port towns
Which among the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Lothal is one of the most prominent cities of the ancient Indus valley civilisation. It is located in Bhal region of the modern state of Gujarat. It was an ancient port. Kalibangan located on the southern banks of the Ghaggar River in Rajasthan.
